image.caption: Collection of the U.S. House of Representatives

profileText: a Representative from Michigan; born in Grand Rapids, Kent County, Mich., January 10, 1988; graduated from East Grand Rapids High School, Grand Rapids, Mich., 2006; attended the United States Military Academy, West Point, N.Y.; B.A., Columbia University, New York, N.Y., 2012; M.B.A., New York University, New York, N.Y., 2017; United States Army Reserve, 2008-2016; non-governmental organization worker; real estate developer; elected as a Republican to the One Hundred Seventeenth Congress (January 3, 2021-January 3, 2023); unsuccessful candidate for renomination to the One Hundred Eighteenth Congress in 2022.
